security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest. Substitute Language SSN
summary: The Assassination Records Review Board determined to postpone in part the release of HSCA staff payroll records, specifically redacting Social Security numbers to protect personal privacy, while acknowledging significant historical interest.
summary_one_paragraph: This document includes the Assassination Records Review Board's final determination to postpone the release of certain information within the HSCA staff payroll records (Record Number 180-10060-10436), specifically Social Security numbers, to prevent unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, balancing this with the historical significance of the document, the document also includes payroll authorization forms for Gerald P. Hamilton from 1976 to 1978, detailing his employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations and his corresponding salary adjustments, signed by Louis Stokes and Henry B. Gonzalez.
title: Final Determination Notification & Payroll Records
